description: A React component named InteractivePanel that provides a user interface with buttons to open modal dialogs for quizzes and flashcards. Includes placeholder content and indicates integration points for backend quiz functionalities.
external_methods: Modal (component with open, onClose, title props)

methods.name: InteractivePanel
methods.description: React functional component that manages state for quiz and flashcard modals, and renders buttons and modals accordingly.
